item.title: Jury deliberations to resume in Harvey Weinstein's sex crimes retrial
item.description: Jurors will resume deliberating in Harvey Weinstein’s New York sex crimes retrial after the ending their first day without reaching a verdict

item.title: As Louisiana's governor faces ethics charges, his lawyer raises bar for future ethics investigations
item.description: Louisiana is poised to adopt new measures that watchdogs warn raise barriers to holding public officials accountable via the state’s ethics board
